sentence.Network_en: According to informed sources, those taken into custody include at least one major-general.
sentence.Network_cn: 据可靠消息，那些被拘捕者当中至少有一位少将。

sentence.Network_en: The major general ranks at this camp.
sentence.Network_cn: 少将是这个营地的最高级军官.

list.abs: 美军军衔 - 军情六处--007的日志 - 网易博客 ... 准将（ Brigadier General） 少将（ Major General） 中将（ Lieutenant General）.

means.word_mean: 1. a general officer ranking above a brigadier general and below a lieutenant general
